Package BobcatLib.Hardware.Sensors.SpatialSensor.Utility

Class DistanceMode

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Hardware.Sensors.SpatialSensor.Utility.DistanceMode
public class DistanceMode extends Object
The DistanceMode class represents the different distance modes used by various Time-of-Flight (ToF) sensors. This class allows conversion between different ranging modes used in various sensor libraries, such as LaserCAN and PWF.

      cm - The distance mode (e.g., SHORT, MEDIUM, LONG).

      public DistanceMode()
      Default constructor for the DistanceMode class. Initializes the distance mode to null (or undefined).

  • Method Details

    • asLaserCAN

      public au.grapplerobotics.interfaces.LaserCanInterface.RangingMode asLaserCAN()
      Converts the current distance mode to a LaserCAN compatible ranging mode.
      Returns:
      The corresponding LaserCAN RangingMode (SHORT, MEDIUM, LONG), or null if no valid mode.

    • asPWF

      public com.playingwithfusion.TimeOfFlight.RangingMode asPWF()
      Converts the current distance mode to a PWF (Playing With Fusion) compatible ranging mode.
      Returns:
      The corresponding PWF RangingMode (Short, Medium, Long), or null if no valid mode.

    • fromPWF

      public DistanceMode fromPWF(com.playingwithfusion.TimeOfFlight.RangingMode mode)
      Converts a PWF RangingMode to a corresponding DistanceMode.
      Parameters:
      mode - The PWF RangingMode (Short, Medium, Long).
      Returns:
      A new DistanceMode instance corresponding to the PWF RangingMode.

    • fromLaserCAN

      public DistanceMode fromLaserCAN(au.grapplerobotics.interfaces.LaserCanInterface.RangingMode mode)
      Converts a LaserCAN RangingMode to a corresponding DistanceMode.
      Parameters:
      mode - The LaserCAN RangingMode (SHORT, MEDIUM, LONG).
      Returns:
      A new DistanceMode instance corresponding to the LaserCAN RangingMode.
